mapper.insert: insert into k_prof_r( class_id, prof_r_result, prof_r_date, prof_q_id ) values( #{classId}, #{profRResult}, now(), #{profQId} )
mapper.select: SELECT m.class_id, c.course_title, u.user_name from k_class_member as m join k_class as cl on m.class_id = cl.class_id join k_users as u on u.user_id = cl.prof_id join k_course as c on c.course_id = cl.course_id where m.stu_id = #{userId} and m.class_id not in (select class_id from k_prof_r);
